resources.string: WELCOME Buddy !! This is a History Flash card game that displays (true or false) questions based on Modern History. LETS TEST YOUR KNOWLEDGE..
True or False , Nelson Mandela was imprisoned in Alcatraz prison in 1956.
TRUE OR FALSE , The Colosseum is an elliptical amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy and was completed in AD 80.
The Colosseum is an elliptical amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy, just east of the Roman Forum
TRE OR FALSE , The Colosseum is an elliptical amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy, just east of the Roman Forum.
TRUE OR FALSE , The Colosseum is an elliptical amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome , Italy ,just east of the Roman Forum.
Apartheid was a system of institutionalised racial segregation that existed in South Africa and South West Africa from 1948 to the early 1990s.
